suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: Add heading
kw.doc: Add a centered heading text element

kw.name: Add text input
kw.doc: Add a text input element

kw.name: Run dialog
kw.doc: Create a dialog from all the defined elements and block until the user has handled it.
kw.msg: Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Get Secret
kw.doc: Read a secret from the configured source, e.g. Robocorp Vault, and return it as a ``Secret`` object.
kw.msg: Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions. Use `New Page` directly instead of `Open Browser` for production and automated execution. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

{"acceptDownloads": true, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": true, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "forcedColors": "none"}

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'bypassCSP': True, 'deviceScaleFactor': 1, 'isMobile': False, 'hasTouch': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'hideRfBrowser': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'forcedColors': 'none'}
Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://robotsparebinindustries.com/#/robot-order

Keyword 'Submit the order' failed after retrying 3 times. The last error was: TimeoutError: locator.waitFor: Timeout 3000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for selector "id=receipt" to be visible ============================================================ Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.

kw.name: Store the receipt as a PDF file
Take a screenshot of the robot
Embed the robot screenshot to the receipt PDF file
Create a ZIP file of the receipts

test.status: Keyword 'Submit the order' failed after retrying 3 times. The last error was: TimeoutError: locator.waitFor: Timeout 3000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for selector "id=receipt" to be visible ============================================================ Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.

suite.doc: Orders robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc. Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.

errors.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.
